attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as we think that the removal of the 10 pence tax band does not help the poor or give encouragement to unemployed people to rejoin the work force. Thus creating avoidable hardships.
attributes.creator_name: Mr Jack Braid + Mrs A Braid

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
